name: Young Miko
description: '''María Victoria Ramírez de Arellano Cardona''' (born November 8, 1997),  known professionally as '''Young Miko''', is a Puerto Rican rapper, singer, songwriter and former footballer. In 2022, she released her debut EP, ''Trap Kitty'', featuring [[Latin trap]] tracks. In April 2024, she released her debut studio album, ''[[Att. (album)|Att.]]'', featuring collaborations with [[Feid]], [[Jowell & Randy]], [[Villano Antillano]], [[Elena Rose]], and [[Dei V]].
